column1: robertlamee,Robert,Lamee,"Environmental expert, specialised in European and Dutch environmental law.",https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C5603AQEf-BIzxF2G3Q/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1517731916179?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=gLn4ABUyjBZnwOni1cR9_owflMpFbyCPLRTs1NTcwU8,,personal,ACoAAAJBPEsBHjbyG4arwh9LEHfl4fre5Gz_kq0,37829707,,"Background and experience Tricert Support/ R.L.A. (Robert) Lamée LLM

More than 25 years experience in  the construction of the so called licensed situation: the complex whole of permits and notifications that surrounds the foundation and operation of factories and other establishments.
Mr. Lamée’s specialties are the  more complicated projects including waste companies and chemical high risk companies.
Tricert is often leading in projects. We take care of consistency in the application of permits and notifications; we select the necessary specialists and control their output.
Tricert Support works exclusively for commercial organizations, but we ensure the satisfaction of all parties involved including the competent authorities.
Motto TS: We always find the right balance between rules and entrepreneurship.

column2: Permit manager development of the new building for the National Institute for Public Health and the environment (RIVM); a mixture of offices and (high risk/BSL3&4) laboratories.
Permit manager Conversion Sewage treatment plant for the municipality of Tilburg. The conversion concerns a sludge treatment that is considered the ultimate in technology in The Netherlands.

Permit manager new water treatment Sewage treatment plant for the municipality of Utrecht. This conversion concerns a ‘Nereda technology’ water treatment that is considered the ultimate in technology worldwide.
Permit manager Salvage team WW II bomber from the ‘Ketelmeer’ in The Netherlands.
Auditor on Dutch and European law in DEKRA audit teams (DEKRA Stuttgart, Germany).
Member management team for the development of the plant for the treatment of medical waste. Medwaste Control Benelux (now part of SRCL/Stericycle Inc.).
Advisor environmental law and occupational health and safety legislation for worldwide recalls (SRCL Leeds, UK).
Senior lecturer environmental law for PHOV (safety experts in training, higher professional education/HBO).
